requestParams.name: account_type
requestParams.desc: 客户类型(与帐户ID配合使用:1=客户(yzUid) ,3:手机号)

requestDemos.code:
token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.crm.customer.growth.list', '1.0.0', 'GET', params=params, files=files)
